forecast.name: M.L. King Jr. Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 44. East wind 1 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun dips low over Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds in a tableau of brilliant blue skies, unmarred by clouds or fog. The chill of the evening is just beginning to settle in, whispering along the streets with a crispness that heralds a drop in temperature. With the gentle push of a northeast wind, the air carries a refreshing clarity, enhancing the beauty of the iconic skyline. There are no shadows of the marine layer here; only the bright outline of the Golden Gate Bridge bridges the bay to the horizons beyond, inviting passersby to linger a moment longer.

As evening approaches, the temperature will ease down toward a cool embrace around 44 degrees. A light jacket or a cozy sweater will be the perfect accompaniment as the breeze dances with the air. A stroll along the waterfront, perhaps paired with the soft murmur of conversation at a local café, would make for a delightful way to enjoy this vibrant evening. Tonight holds the promise of stillness and serenity, perfect for winding down the day as the city hums gently with life.
